contentList.content: Three target creatures in the area gain [1] and have <LSTag Tooltip="Advantage">Advantage</LSTag> on Wisdom <LSTag Tooltip="SavingThrow">Saving Throws</LSTag>. If hit by an attack, an affected creature has <LSTag Tooltip="Advantage">Advantage</LSTag> on its next <LSTag Tooltip="AttackRoll">Attack Roll</LSTag> during combat.
Evoke a heavenly flare and possibly <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="BLINDING_SMITE_BLINDED">Blind</LSTag> your target for [1] turns.
